pullRequest.body:
The file `CategoryTheory.Limits.Types` is split in several files `Limits`, `Colimits`, `Images`, `Yoneda`, and `TypesFiltered` is moved to `Types.Filtered`.

This prepares for a refactor of colimits of types following #23339.

---
